text: Fusolatirus suduirauti is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== The shell size varies between 25 mm and 50 mm ==Distribution== This species is distributed in the seas off the Philippines. Abapertural view of the shell of Fusolatirus suduirauti ==References== * Fraussen K. 2003. Two new Euthria (Gastropoda, Buccinidae) from Philippine Islands. Gloria Maris 42(1): 22-30 ==External links== * Category:Fasciolariidae Category:Gastropods described in 2003
title: Fusolatirus suduirauti
